title: Cloud re Pages Display page only for authenticated users
body:
If you don’t host static sites on GitHub Pages and don’t hold backends, you can deploy them on Cloud re Pages, and you can only use Cloud。re Access to authenticate and pass them.

Cloudパフォーマンスre _ Cloud Webre

## GitHub / GitLab

You can set the deployment at the time of pushed, and it will be automatically linked by。 from the following screen.

The domain is assigned to each project and the preview environment of each pushed branch is deployed to the sub .

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29157528/167156872-409ce84b-f912-44e3-83bc-1e4c37728dc8.png)

Build commands such as SPA can be set. Note that if you do not set the environment variable, you need to specify `NODE_VERSION` in the environment variable because the version of Node is automatically 12.

Although Python scripts can be rotated with preイメージment, 3.8 or more interpreters are not present in the image, so they cannot be used. This must also be specified with `PYTHON_VERSION`.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29157528/167157817-3dd93ca1-fd8b-44d7-8bfc-06d703357f96.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29157528/167162708-2a5a77fd-7eec-4edd-9e18-55cce7702887.png)

You can see that the process is running automatically when you push it from GitHub.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29157528/167157214-336b032d-708e-4510-8592-473da8a4d5f0.png)

## User 

Configure from Settings - > General - > Access Policy.

If you want to set a policy for the domain of the preview environment, you can create a policy for `*.project.pages.dev` and `project.pages.dev`.

The following login screen will be displayed.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29157528/167158540-73cb3628-23b6-4f73-ba63-0abaaa405453.png)

#

It takes more than GitHub Pages, but it is easy to implement user authentication, and it seems to be bad for cooperation with repository. (It is a little difficult to use the management screen)

[Cloud。re Zero Trust] (https://www.cloud。re.com/en- jp/products/zero- trust/) The application policy of Cloud。re Pages was not created from the screen, and I felt that it was a little difficult to understand when I need to create a policy from Pages.
